title: Print, "Livre d'Ornamens de fleurons, cadres, tables, portes, chemineés consoles, portemontres, buffets, cartouches, lampes d'eglise, encensoirs, navettes, croix, and soleils"

provenance: From the Collection of Léon Decloux
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Five ornament designs related to acanthus scrolls

tombstone.epitaph: Print, "Livre d'Ornamens de fleurons, cadres, tables, portes, chemineés consoles, portemontres, buffets, cartouches, lampes d'eglise, encensoirs, navettes, croix, and soleils". Sheet: 43.3 x 27.2 cm (17 1/16 x 10 11/16 in.). Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-236-5.
